jmf.discovery

Interface IPeerDiscoveryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeerDiscoveryService

    public interface IPeerDiscoveryService
    Interface to access the PeerDiscoveryService - Service class to recognize other modules and there states in the network. PeerStates can be accessed via PeerRegistry (getPeerRegistry) Created on 8/1/15.
    Author:
    Tobias Korb
